text: I don't care what you think about me. I don't think about you at all.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion has two purposes: comfort and love. Beauty comes when fashion succeeds.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I like fashion to go down to the street, but I can't accept that it should originate there.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is architecture. It is a matter of proportions.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
author: Coco Chanel

text: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Women have always been the strong ones of the world. The men are always seeking from women a little pillow to put their heads down on. They are always longing for the mother who held them as infants.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A woman with good shoes is never ugly.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Keep your heels, head and standards high.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Be classy. Anything but trashy.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I love luxury. And luxury lies not in richness and ornateness but in the absence of vulgarity. Vulgarity is the ugliest word in our language. I stay in the game to fight it.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I don't understand how a woman can leave the house without fixing herself up a little - if only out of politeness. And then, you never know, maybe that s the day she has a date with destiny. And it s best to be as pretty as possible for destiny.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

text: You can be gorgeous at thirty, charming at forty, and irresistible for the rest of your life.
author: Coco Chanel

text: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Before you leave the house, look in the mirror and remove one accessory.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life.
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.
author: Coco Chanel

text: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!
author: Coco Chanel

text: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Jump out the window if you are the object of passion. Flee it if you feel it. Passion goes, boredom remains.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The best accessory for a woman, handsome man!
author: Coco Chanel

text: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Keep your heels, head, and standards high.
author: Coco Chanel

text: No elegance is possible without perfume. It is the unseen, unforgettable, ultimate accessory.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Wear perfume wherever you want to be kissed.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Wear perfume wherever you want to be kissed!
author: Coco Chanel

text: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A well dressed man is a best accessory a woman can have.
author: Coco Chanel

text: When putting on accessories, take off the last thing you've put on.
author: Coco Chanel

text: It is the unseen, unforgettable, ultimate accessory of fashion that heralds your arrival and prolongs your departure.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Dress like you're going to meet your worst enemy today.
author: Coco Chanel

text: You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The best things in life are free. The second-best things are very, very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

text: As soon as you set foot on a yacht you belong to some man, not to yourself, and you die of boredom.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Costume jewelry is not made to give women an aura of wealth, but to make them beautiful.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I don't do fashion. I am fashion.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I don't care what you think about me; I don't think about you at all!
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack. Men hate women who weep.
author: Coco Chanel

text: A woman needs ropes and ropes of pearls.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Some people think luxury is the opposite of poverty. It is not. It is the opposite of vulgarity.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I don’t care what you think about me. I don’t think about you at all.
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you’re sad, add more lipstick and attack.
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you are sad, if you are heartbroken, make yourself up, dress up, add more lipstick and attack. Men hate women who weep.
author: Coco Chanel

text: You live but once; you might as well be amusing.
author: Coco Chanel

text: There are rich people, and there are those who have money. They are not the same people.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is in the sky, in the street.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion is everything that can pass fashionable
author: Coco Chanel

text: To be irreplaceable, you have to be different.
author: Coco Chanel

text: One can get used to ugliness, but never to negligence.
author: Coco Chanel

text: I consider lace to be one of the prettiest imitations ever made of the fantasy of nature; lace always evokes for me those incomparable designs which the branches and leaves of trees embroider across the sky, and I do not think that any invention of the human spirit could have a more graceful or precise origin.
author: Coco Chanel

text: One should refrain from contempt for the baser specimens of humanity, for whom liberation amounts to shaving the heads of women who have slept with Germans.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The best things in life are free. The second best things are very,very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them from growing.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Don’t spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it's up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside
author: Coco Chanel

text: If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them form growing.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Everyday is a fashion show and the world is the runway.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you
author: Coco Chanel

text: Elegance comes from being as beautiful inside as outside.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Fashion changes. Style remains.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Adornment, what a science! Beauty, what a weapon! Modesty, what elegance!
author: Coco Chanel

text: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: Coco Chanel

text: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you.
author: Coco Chanel

text: Beware originality. In women fashion originality can lead to carnival.
author: Coco Chanel
